transformations.name: Constant
transformations.description: Creating/updating the columns 'target_code, date_inserted, date_last_updated, inserted_by, last_updated_by, source_system, source_column'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TCrossreference
TCrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 802) ~> FilterCodeTypeID802
Aggregate1 derive(date_inserted = currentTimestamp(),
		date_last_updated = currentTimestamp(),
		inserted_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_PREMIUM_TYPE',
		last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_PREMIUM_TYPE',
		source_system = 'MAPPINGSYSTEM',
		source_column = 'TARGET_CODE') ~> Constant
FilterCodeTypeID802 aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> Aggregate1
Constant select(mapColumn(
		pk_key_pty = TARGET_CODE,
		pty_code = TARGET_CODE,
		pty_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		pty_source_column = source_column,
		pty_source_system = source_system,
		inserted_by,
		date_inserted,
		last_updated_by,
		date_last_updated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_premium_type'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkPreDimPremiumType
